General.Name: Dana Resources
General.Description: Dana Resources, an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Peru. It holds interests in 19 patented and unpatented base and precious metal mining properties located in the provinces of Chumbivilcas, Recuay, Piura, Huaytara, Pallasca, and Huancabamba. The company was formerly known as DanaPC.com and changed its name to Dana Resources in February 2007. Dana Resources was founded in 2006 and is based in Miraflores, Peru.
